study_plan_entry.title: Strategy for the assignment of 2D NMR spectra of complex organic molecules

free_text.Learning outcomes: Be able to assign 2D NMR spetra of complex organic molecules.
free_text.Content: Information that can be extracted from COSY, TOCSY, ROESY, HSQC, HMBC.[br/]Strategy of assignment of complex organic molecules, superimposition of spectra.[br/]Practical exercices (done independently by each attendee): full spectra assignment of chloropromazine, indometacin, budesonide, cocaine, loperamide, cyclosporin.[br/]
free_text.Keywords: 2D NMR assignment, COSY, TOCSY, ROESY, HSQC, HMBC, organic molecule, natural compounds [br/]
